name: Unfrag
description:
A short game made for the Weekly game Jam 210, on the theme of "fragments".

You play as a broken up magical stone statue, and must traverse the level to recover the various missing parts and their corresponding abilities.

I used two UE4 ..... :

Sound Phenomenon Fantasy Orchestra by Taylor Brook Music

and 

Necro's utility material pack by necrophob30.

CONTROLS:

WASD to move.

Spacebar to jump. Spacebar again in the air to multijump, up to 3 times.

Right click to rotate a block

Left click to pull a block

R to restart the level

F to pause the game.

Escape to leave the game.
